subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
lead_paragraph: Michael Sam, a defensive end from Missouri who is openly gay, is considered a middle-round to late-round N.F.L. draft pick, and may not be drafted at all.
snippet: Michael Sam, a defensive end from Missouri who is openly gay, is considered a middle-round to late-round N.F.L. draft pick, and may not be drafted at all.
